name: bootstrap-tooltip-custom-class
description: Extends Bootstrap Tooltips and Popovers by adding custom classes.

scripts.install-v3: cd bootstrap-v3 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-v4: cd bootstrap-v4 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-v4-alpha: cd bootstrap-v4-alpha && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-v5: cd bootstrap-v5 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm run install-v3 && npm run install-v4 && npm run install-v4-alpha && npm run install-v5
scripts.build-v3: npm run build-v3-tooltip && npm run build-v3-popover
scripts.build-v4: npm run build-v4-tooltip && npm run build-v4-popover
scripts.build-v4-alpha: npm run build-v4-alpha-tooltip && npm run build-v4-alpha-popover
scripts.build-v5: npm run build-v5-tooltip && npm run build-v5-popover
scripts.build-all: npm run build-v3 && npm run build-v4 && npm run build-v4-alpha && npm run build-v5
scripts.version-all: npm run version-v3 && npm run version-v4 && npm run version-v4-alpha && npm run version-v5
